alert.note: Alert for Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 8:56PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sullivan, northwestern Hillsborough and southwestern Merrimack Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 855 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baltimore Vermont, or near Chester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Henniker, New London, Charlestown, Bradford, Newport, Windsor, Hillsborough, Warner, Marlow, Deering, Alstead, Cornish, Lempster, Acworth, Goshen, Croydon, Langdon, Washington and Newbury. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 20 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
